skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Strikes the enemy and increases your attack speed for 2 turns with a critical hit.

skills.name: Defend
skills.description: Decreases the inflicted damage to 0 for 3 turns when your ally is attacked and receives 50% of the original damage. Instantly recovers a turn, afterwards.

skill_effect.name: Defend
skill_effect.description: Monster that applies Hug will take damage from monster with effect. Does not protect against debuffs.

skills.name: Trick of Darkness
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spell that summons the power of darkness. This attack has a 75% chance to block the beneficial effects granted on the target for 2 turns. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
skill_effect.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.29*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
